SystemPrompt:
You are a helpful assistant with high skills in software, prompt engineering and business development. The user will provide a requirement to create a software module. Your task is elavorate a prompt detailing that requirement the most possible.
### Requirements:
- Assign a name to the software module.
- Generate a clear prompt that will be used as input for an LLM model to design the first version of this software module.
- Avoid mentioning version numbers, this will be managed later.
- Avoid mention an expected response format, this will be provided later.
- Avoid specifying the behaivor the LLM model must take, this will be managed later.
- The response must be in markdown notation.
- Focus on functional details
- Avoid suggesting platforms, programming languages or any other implementation details.
- Detail the user interaction with the module.
- Generate a list of minimum features, desired features and bar-raiser features.
- Data models description must be included and must be in markdown notation. IMPORTANT: It will be processed as string.
- Make clear all models should implement CRUDS operations.
### Example output:
{"module_name":"MODULE_NAME" "reviewed_prompt":"GENERATED PROMPT","functional_details":"["FUNCTIONAL DETAIL 1","FUNCTIONAL DETAIL 2"],"user_interaction":"[USER INTERACTION 1, USER INTERACTION 2]","minimum_features":"[MINIMUM FEATURE 1, MINIMUM FEATURE 2]","desired_features":"[DESIRED FEATURE 1, DESIRED FEATURE 2]","bar_raiser_features":"[BAR RAISER FEATURE 1, BAR RAISER FEATURE 2]","data_models":"[DATA MODEL 1, DATA MODEL 2]"}
BasePrompt: Analyze and improve the next prompt, adding all the possible details. This are the initial or high-level requirements: <TASK_INPUT>
TaskInput: Track daily expenses and categorize them for monthly reports
ModelRawResponse:
{
  "choices": [
    {
      "message": {
        "content": "```json
{
  "module_name": "ExpenseTracker",
  "reviewed_prompt": "Design a software module that allows users to track daily expenses, categorize them, and generate monthly reports. The module should enable users to log expenses with details such as amount, date, category, and optional notes. Users should be able to view, edit, and delete expenses as needed. The system should support categorization of expenses into predefined or custom categories, and provide the ability to generate detailed monthly reports summarizing expenses by category. The module should ensure data integrity and provide a user-friendly interface for managing expenses.",
  "functional_details": [
    "Log daily expenses with details such as amount, date, category, and optional notes.",
    "Categorize expenses into predefined or custom categories.",
    "Generate monthly reports summarizing expenses by category.",
    "View, edit, and delete expenses as needed."
  ],
  "user_interaction": [
    "User logs in to the system.",
    "User adds a new expense with details such as amount, date, category, and optional notes.",
    "User views a list of expenses, filtered by date or category.",
    "User edits or deletes an existing expense.",
    "User generates a monthly report summarizing expenses by category."
  ],
  "minimum_features": [
    "Log daily expenses with basic details (amount, date, category).",
    "Basic categorization of expenses.",
    "View and edit expenses.",
    "Generate simple monthly reports."
  ],
  "desired_features": [
    "Custom expense categories.",
    "Advanced filtering and sorting of expenses.",
    "Export reports in multiple formats (e.g., PDF, CSV).",
    "Visual charts for expense summaries."
  ],
  "bar_raiser_features": [
    "Recurring expense tracking.",
    "Budgeting tools with alerts for overspending.",
    "Integration with bank accounts for automatic expense tracking.",
    "Multi-user support with role-based access."
  ],
  "data_models": [
    "**Expense**: `id`, `amount`, `date`, `category_id`, `notes`, `user_id`",
    "**Category**: `id`, `name`, `description`, `user_id`",
    "**User**: `id`, `username`, `email`, `password_hash`",
    "**Report**: `id`, `month`, `year`, `user_id`, `generated_at`"
  ]
}
```"
      }
    }
  ]
}
